info.author: www.stani.be
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
SPE is a python IDE with auto-indentation, auto completion, call tips, syntax
coloring, UML viewer, syntax highlighting, class explorer, source index, auto
todo list, sticky notes, integrated pycrust shell, python file browser, recent
file browser, drag&drop, context help, ... A special feature is its ability to
run interactively inside blender with a 3d object browser. 

Spe integrates with XRCed (GUI designer) and ships with wxGlade (GUI designer),
PyChecker (source code doctor), Kiki (regular expression console) and WinPdb
(remote, multi-threaded debugger).

SPE runs on Windows, Linux and Mac OS X.
info.name: SPE
info.summary: Python IDE with Blender, Kiki, PyChecker, Remote debugger, Uml and wxGlade support
info.html_description:
SPE is a python IDE with auto-indentation, auto completion, call tips, syntax coloring, UML viewer, syntax highlighting, class explorer, source index, auto todo list, sticky notes, integrated pycrust shell, python file browser, recent file browser, drag&drop, context help, … A special feature is its ability to run interactively inside blender with a 3d object browser.

Spe integrates with XRCed (GUI designer) and ships with wxGlade (GUI designer), PyChecker (source code doctor), Kiki (regular expression console) and WinPdb (remote, multi-threaded debugger).

SPE runs on Windows, Linux and Mac OS X.
